thread.title: Dates Announced for The Worlds Biggest Connected Mobility Event TU-Automotive Detroit
thread.title_full: Dates Announced for The Worlds Biggest Connected Mobility Event TU-Automotive Detroit - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Dates Announced for The Worlds Biggest Connected Mobility Event TU-Automotive Detroit
text:
TU-Automotive is delighted to announce that the 16th Annual TU-Automotive Detroit 2016 Conference and Exhibition will take place on June 8-9 at the Suburban Collection Showplace, Novi, MI.
(PRWEB) October 26, 2015
In its 16th year, this is the world’s largest event dedicated to connected car technology and innovation. The event again saw record-breaking attendance in 2015 as the industry buzzes with excitement about the opportunities presented by the new paradigm of auto-mobility.
Automakers such as Ford, Audi & GM, are outlining visions of how mobility will look in the future and announcements continue to come from tech giants, namely Google and Apple, suggesting their intention to build cars.
TU-Automotive Detroit is the place for executives in automotive and related verticals to come together to build relationships, close deals and hear from C-level speakers outlining strategies that will affect the entire automotive industry and more.
Take a look at the newly released TU-Automotive Detroit 2016 video to see why senior executives consider this a must-attend event: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IpbgPcZIQQM .
TU-Automotive Detroit director, Justin Parker, stated: “To say 2016 is a big year for the connected car is an understatement. The buzz in the industry is only going to grow as even more verticals become connected to automotive and the technology captures consumers’ imagination.” He continued, “The tech giants are on the verge of some big disruptive announcements that are already causing traditional players to sit up and listen. Never before has there been such a need for those involved to stay informed.”
TU-Automotive Detroit at the Center of Connectivtiy, Mobility and Autonomy
The conference centers on the three pillars of automotive – connectivity, smart mobility and autonomous driving. The topics discussed in four conference tracks over two days cover all of the business critical areas ranging from security, data monetization, new models of car ownership, safety and much more.
For more information on the sessions and speakers and what to expect in 2016 see the website at: http://www.tu-auto.com/detroit .
About TU-Automotive
TU-Automotive is a world leader in providing events and business intelligence to the automotive technology community, covering the connected car, connected mobility, autonomous vehicles and legal & insurance. You can sign up to receive free weekly updates, including exclusive industry analysis, interviews and insights at: http://www.tu-auto.com .

Project Director | TU-Automotive
